faction.description: Which factions this hive mind belongs to.

selected_encounter_member_weight_multipl.description: Multiplier to increase the likleyhood of encounter squads containing the selected member

patrol_spotting_settings.description: Callout IDs for spotting patrols against this faction

forced_encounter_point_amount.description: Encounter points forced value - e.g. for tutorial

forced_encounter_enemy_cap.description: Encounter enemy cap value - e.g. for tutorial

encounter_enemy_cap_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the difficulty settings enemy cap.

mission_time_start_paused.description: [bool]if set, mission time will start paused waiting for a call to explicitly start it.
